title: Liverpool team news: Predicted line-up in 4-3-3 formation ahead of today’s clash with Newcastle
text:
Liverpool look to continue their unbeaten Premier League start at Anfield, with Newcastle United the visitors this weekend.

Jurgen Klopp remains without goalkeeper Alisson and right-back Nathaniel Clyne, but has no other fresh injury concerns, and Naby Keita is back in training and could feature.

Newcastle suffered a further injury blow this week, with Sean Longstaff ruled out of the game after turning an ankle in training.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

Steve Bruce's side are 14th in the Premier League table, with a point against Watford following their impressive victory at Tottenham after beginning the season with two defeats.

Here is how we think Liverpool will line-up for the Premier League fixture.
